title: BTS album total sales in South Korea 2013 to 2017
yAxis: Number of sold albums in thousand copies
summary: Overall Number of sold albums in thousand copies has increased over the Year.
Number of sold albums in thousand copies is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015.
The line significantly increased by 345.0 from Year 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Number of sold albums in thousand copies, of value 563.0 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Number of sold albums in thousand copies, of value 218.0 was reported at Year 2014
